TopicTitle: [Request] Small thermal control system part that does not rotate

Articles.Content:
Hey all,

Bit of a strange request here.
I had an idea to use the small thermal control system as a 'walkway' of sorts to get from ground to aeroplane. The problem being, the part rotates once activated, and also looks and feels a little flimsy.

If someone who knows what they're doing has a bit of spare time, could you possibly make said part (either an edited original or a duplicate part, the same model is more than good enough) stronger and remove its tendency to rotate, or possibly make it so it can be rotated at will? 
It doesn't have to still operate as a radiator - it can just be a structural part.

Thank you in advance to anyone who can help,
Kyrian
